Posts.Content:
Hello,
 I am normally on the prostate cancer forum, but I thought maybe someone could help me out in here. I was dx with advanced prostate cancer and I am on hormone treatment. I am doing well with the treatment but my onc. Dr. Wants to add Taxol to my treatment. I was concerned about
 long term side effects. I am also on Xgeva .Can anyone share your experience with Taxol?
Thanks 
CADguy
Posts.Title: Adding chemo
